definitions_glossary.aspect_ratio: Ratio of width to height of a rectangle
definitions_glossary.dynamic_rectangle: Rectangle that maintains its proportions when subdivided
definitions_glossary.self_similar: Property where parts resemble the whole
definitions_glossary.golden_spiral: Spiral generated by successive golden rectangles
definitions_glossary.whirling_squares: Sequence of squares in nested golden rectangles

self_similarity.operation: Remove square of side equal to shorter side
self_similarity.result: Remaining rectangle is also golden (ratio φ)

steps: 1. Draw square ABCD with side length 1
2. Find midpoint M of side AB
3. Draw arc from M through C to point E on extension of AB

construction_methods.formula: For any width w, set height h = φw where φ = (1+√5)/2

properties: Adding a square to the short side creates a larger golden rectangle
Removing a square from the long side creates a smaller golden rectangle
Diagonals of successive golden rectangles intersect at 'eye' of golden spiral
Area of nth rectangle in sequence = φⁿ⁻¹ × (area of first rectangle)
Perimeter ratio of successive rectangles = φ

golden_spiral_generation.method: Connect opposite corners of successive squares with quarter-circle arcs
golden_spiral_generation.mathematical_form: Logarithmic spiral with growth factor φ per quarter turn

definition.@value: A rectangle whose side lengths are in the golden ratio φ ≈ 1.618
